channel.title: Portfolios on TheBoxScoreR
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on TheBoxScoreR

item.title: Virginia Tech - Map of Building Ages
item.description: This is my first post to my blog. This post is part of a project I am working on at my job at Virginia Tech. Part of the project involved creating a map of buildings on campus and mapping amounts to show spending over a period of time. Due to the confidentiality of the spending amounts, I decided to webscrape campus buildings and their ages from this website and map them using the leaflet package in R.
